text: ✨ Artifact Equip: Gratitude Rune — 'Write down one thing you're grateful for. +5 to Resilience and Happiness.'
🎲 Bonus Drop: Try Something New — 'Do one new thing. Surprise joy and XP boost possible!'
🔋 Spell Cast: Mental Reset — 'Take 10 deep breaths. Mind restarts like a legendary device. Mana refilled.'
🛡️ Boundary Builder Skill — 'Say no to one distraction. Guard your time. Shield charged.'
💎 Memory Chest: Yesterday’s Win — 'Recall one small win. XP claimed. Motivation bar recharged.'
🎵 Instant Buff: One-Minute Dance — 'Turn on your favorite song. Dance for 60 seconds. +10 Mood. +5 Confidence.'
